wikipedia_page.main: Charles Boileau Elliott (1803–1875) was an English travel writer. He published 3 travel diaries in his lifetime.  His best known works are Letters from the North of Europe, Travels in the Three Great Empires, and Travels in the Archipelago.  All 3 books provide a unique historical account of life in those areas during the mid 1800s just prior to the wars and industrial achievements that would be coming later in the 20th century.
